long.ar:
Dark Theme - Dark Reader for Chrome will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Dark Mode for social networks - dark theme for Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube adn mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

If the website has built-in dark theme, you can control it directly from Night mode and if it doesn't (like Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github and millions others),  dark mode extension will convert the colors to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

What will you get from Dark Mode extension:

- Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion. Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion. Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer. Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Reader extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Reader
Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making them high contrast and easy to read at night. Dark mode will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme 
Instagram Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Instagram Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Instagram dark theme

Facebook dark mode or Facebook dark theme 
FB Dark Mode extension converts Facebook theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Facebook Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Facebook dark theme

Github dark mode or Github dark theme 
Github Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Github Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Github dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Use a Dark Mode for Google Docs?
Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Download dark mode now in your web browser! Dark Mode functionality for Google, YouTube, Facebook and many other websites - get it now and keep your eyes relaxed in dark hours!

VK dark mode or Vk dark theme 
Classic dark theme for Vkontakte. Switch VK to dark mode and back in one click. Dark theme VKontakte protects the eyes. It eliminates the load at night, replacing the white screen with a classic dark theme.

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

New Tab for Chrome with ChatGPT
Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. New Tab - Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tab with ChatGPT. Open AI ChatGPT

ChatGPT for Google
ChatGPT engage in conversations with humans and answer a wide range of questions on various topics. ChatGPT -  start a chat with ChatGPT immediately after getting an answer.

Activating Dark Mode for CharGPT - Open AI
 - ChatGPT offers a dark mode option for a more comfortable viewing experience in low-light settings. 
 - This can also help reduce eye strain.

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Theme.
long.am:
Turn on Dark Mode for Web Page. Take care of your eyes, and use a dark theme for the night and daily browsing
Switch on Dark Mode for web browser. Protect your eyes when you are using the computer.

Working on a computer in a night time may take effect to your eyes or can disturb other people in the same room. Dark Mode is a good opportunity to reduce screen brightening to take care of your eyes. 

Dark Mode isn't suitable for all websites, so applying warm colors to all websites will be best alternative for screen tinting. 

üåô Dark Mode for web browser
Activate Dark mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Dark Mode extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark.

‚ö° You need to refresh all the tabs, which were opened BEFORE the Dark Mode was installed. You can also restart the web to refresh all the tabs at once. Otherwise, Dark Mode will work only with the newly opened tabs. 

Features of the extension:

- Completely free, no in-app purchases
- You can turn on dark mode for any website
- You can install the plugin in one click
- The plugin is small, it does not make your computer slower

Screen Shader Mode is a pleasure for your eyes!

Please share your feedback and suggestions in the comments section!

üåô Activate Dark Mode for your web browser to protect your eyes while using the computer.

üí° Working on a computer at night may strain your eyes and disturb others in the room. Dark Mode helps reduce screen brightness, promoting eye care.

üåê While Dark Mode may not be suitable for all websites, applying warm colors universally serves as a great alternative for screen tinting.

üöÄ Dark Mode extension effortlessly shifts browser content colors to a warmer tone after dark. Refresh tabs for optimal performance.

‚ö° After installing Dark Mode, refresh tabs opened before installation for full effect. Restart the web to refresh all tabs at once.

üåà Features of the extension:

- Free with no in-app purchases
- Enable dark mode for any website
- Easy one-click installation
- Lightweight, ensuring no impact on computer speed

üíª Screen Shader Mode: A delightful experience for your eyes! Share your feedback and suggestions in the comments section!

Aplica tots els llocs web al navegador en mode fosc i exclou qualsevol domini del tema negre per obtenir una millor experi√®ncia. √âs possible crear el vostre propi tema personalitzat amb qualsevol color que us agradi.

Si el lloc web t√© un tema fosc integrat, podeu controlar-lo directament des del mode nocturn i, si no ho fa (com Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github i milions d'altres), l'extensi√≥ del mode fosc convertir√† els colors per oferir-vos amb mode fosc suau i consistent.

- Activa/desactiva el mode fosc manualment - Fes clic a la icona de l'extensi√≥ per activar/desactivar el mode fosc.

El torn nocturn i l'extensi√≥ del lector fosc canvien autom√†ticament els colors del contingut del vostre navegador a l'extrem m√©s c√†lid de l'espectre de color despr√©s de la foscor.

Facebook Dark Mode - Dark Reader for Chrome will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Dark Mode for social networks - dark theme for Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube adn mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

If the website has built-in dark theme, you can control it directly from Night mode and if it doesn't (like Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github and millions others),  dark mode extension will convert the colors to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

What will you get from Dark Mode extension:

- Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion. Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion. Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer. Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Reader extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Reader
Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making them high contrast and easy to read at night. Dark mode will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Use a Dark Mode for Google Docs?
Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Download dark mode now in your web browser! Dark Mode functionality for Google, YouTube, Facebook and many other websites - get it now and keep your eyes relaxed in dark hours!

VK dark mode or Vk dark theme 
Classic dark theme for Vkontakte. Switch VK to dark mode and back in one click. Dark theme VKontakte protects the eyes. It eliminates the load at night, replacing the white screen with a classic dark theme.

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

New Tab for Chrome with ChatGPT
Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. New Tab - Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tab with ChatGPT. Open AI ChatGPT

long.fil:
Dark Mode is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen (browser) to dark at night time

dark mode - dark reader for Chrome will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Dark Mode for social networks - dark theme for Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube adn mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

If the website has built-in dark theme, you can control it directly from Night mode and if it doesn't (like Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github and millions others),  dark mode extension will convert the colors to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

What will you get from dark mode extension:

- Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion. Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion. Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer. Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

night shift and dark reader extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Reader
Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making them high contrast and easy to read at night. Dark mode will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme 
Instagram Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Instagram Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Instagram dark theme

Facebook dark mode or Facebook dark theme 
FB Dark Mode extension converts Facebook theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Facebook Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Facebook dark theme

Github dark mode or Github dark theme 
Github Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Github Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Github dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Use a Dark Mode for Google Docs?
Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Download dark mode now in your web browser! Dark Mode functionality for Google, YouTube, Facebook and many other websites - get it now and keep your eyes relaxed in dark hours!

VK dark mode or Vk dark theme 
Classic dark theme for Vkontakte. Switch VK to dark mode and back in one click. Dark theme VKontakte protects the eyes. It eliminates the load at night, replacing the white screen with a classic dark theme.

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

New Tab for Chrome with ChatGPT
Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. New Tab - Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tab with ChatGPT. Open AI ChatGPT

ChatGPT for Google
ChatGPT engage in conversations with humans and answer a wide range of questions on various topics. ChatGPT -  start a chat with ChatGPT immediately after getting an answer.

Activating Dark Mode for CharGPT - Open AI
 - ChatGPT offers a dark mode option for a more comfortable viewing experience in low-light settings. 
 - This can also help reduce eye strain.

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Theme.

Primijenite sve web stranice u pregledniku u tamni naƒçin rada i iskljuƒçite sve domene iz crne teme za bolje iskustvo. Moguƒáe je izraditi vlastitu prilagoƒëenu temu s bilo kojom bojom koju ≈æelite.

Pro≈°irenje "Dark Theme for Google" donosi prilagodljivu tamnu temu na neke Googleove usluge kao ≈°to su Google Search i Google Images. Pro≈°irenje podr≈æava sve lokalizirane Google domene.

Nema vi≈°e potrebe otvarati postavke jednu po jednu za razliƒçite web stranice - samo jedna aplikacija donosi crnu temu na cijelu mre≈æu.

Stranica s opcijama je sada dostupna! Korisne znaƒçajke:

Dark Theme for YouTube pro≈°irenje pretvara YouTube temu u vrlo prilagodljivu temu tamni ugljen/plava. Ovo pro≈°irenje Dark Reader izgraƒëeno je na temelju zadane YouTube teme (izvorna tamna tema) tako da je vrlo lagano u usporedbi s upotrebom tema umetnutih Stylish ili Stylus pro≈°irenjima.

Preuzmite mraƒçni naƒçin rada sada u svom web pregledniku!

Vrlo prilagodljiva nativna tamna tema za twitch.tv (platforma za igraƒçe)

KAKO KORISTITI Dark Reader:

Tamni naƒçin rada i noƒána smjena za sve popularne stranice na jednom mjestu. Mraƒçni Youtube, Mraƒçni Facebook, Mraƒçni Twitter, sve ovo i mnogo vi≈°e u va≈°em pregledniku. Jednostavno instalirajte pro≈°irenje kako biste omoguƒáili crni naƒçin rada za Chrome.

modalit√† oscura: il lettore oscuro per Chrome metter√† il tema scuro su tutti i siti Web, adatto a chi lavora di notte e il lettore oscuro per le notizie online o la lettura di libri.

Applica tutti i siti Web nel browser in modalit√† oscura ed escludi qualsiasi dominio dal tema nero per una migliore esperienza. √à possibile creare il proprio tema personalizzato con qualsiasi colore si desideri.

Modalit√† oscura per i social network: il tema scuro per Instagram, Twitter, Twitch, YouTube e i siti mainstream e tutti gli altri siti Web saranno tutti coperti di colori neri.

Se il sito Web ha un tema scuro integrato, puoi controllarlo direttamente dalla modalit√† notturna e, in caso contrario (come Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github e milioni di altri), l'estensione della modalit√† oscura convertir√† i colori per fornirti con modalit√† oscura uniforme e coerente.

Cosa otterrai dall'estensione della modalit√† oscura:

- Attiva/disattiva la modalit√† oscura manualmente - Fai clic sull'icona dell'estensione per attivare/disattivare la modalit√† oscura.
- Escludi/Includi un sito dalla modalit√† oscura - Scegli "Modalit√† oscura" > "Disabilita/Abilita modalit√† oscura per questo sito"
- Personalizza i colori per i siti web - Cambia tutti i colori che desideri.
- Programma automatico - Abilitare "Auto ON/OFF" nella sezione.

Non √® pi√π necessario aprire le impostazioni una per una per diversi siti Web: solo un'app porta il tema nero su tutta la rete.

La pagina delle opzioni √® ora disponibile! Caratteristiche utili:

- Esclusione del sito. Inserisci un indirizzo web corretto per escludere la pagina dall'applicazione del tema nero.
- Esclusione pagine. Facoltativamente, aggiungi i domini che non desideri applicare al tema nero.
- Cambia tema. Crea il tuo tema personalizzato! Salvalo, rinominalo e applicalo in qualsiasi momento.

Basta installare un'estensione per abilitare la modalit√† oscura per Chrome.

Turno di notte
Attiva la modalit√† Night Shift per invertire la normale luce dello schermo in un tono pi√π caldo, evitando cos√¨ danni agli occhi. Puoi attivare e disattivare lo strumento con un solo clic quando ne hai bisogno.

Il turno di notte e l'estensione del lettore scuro spostano automaticamente i colori del contenuto del browser all'estremit√† pi√π calda dello spettro dei colori dopo il tramonto.

Lettore oscuro
Dark Reader inverte i colori brillanti, rendendoli ad alto contrasto e facili da leggere di notte. La modalit√† oscura metter√† il tema scuro su tutti i siti Web, adatto a chi lavora di notte e lettore oscuro per notizie online o lettura di libri.

L'estensione Super Dark Mode pu√≤ oscurare quasi tutti i siti Web, nonch√© i file locali aperti da Chrome, come i PDF. D'ora in poi, i tuoi occhi possono essere rilassati durante la navigazione sul Web sullo schermo di notte.

Modalit√† oscura di Youtube o tema scuro di Youtube
L'estensione Tema scuro per YouTube converte il tema di YouTube in un tema blu/antracite scuro altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Youtube Dark Reader √® basata sul tema YouTube predefinito (tema scuro nativo), quindi √® molto leggera rispetto all'utilizzo di temi iniettati dalle estensioni Stylish o Stylus.

Modalit√† oscura di Instagram o tema scuro di Instagram
L'estensione Instagram Dark Mode converte il tema Instagram in un tema carbone scuro/blu altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Instagram Dark Reader √® basata sul tema predefinito di Instagram. Tema scuro di Instagram

Modalit√† oscura di Facebook o tema scuro di Facebook
L'estensione FB Dark Mode converte il tema di Facebook in un tema antracite scuro/blu altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Facebook Dark Reader √® basata sul tema predefinito di Instagram. Tema scuro di Facebook

Modalit√† oscura Github o tema scuro Github
L'estensione Github Dark Mode converte il tema Instagram in un tema carbone scuro/blu altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Github Dark Reader √® basata sul tema predefinito di Instagram. Tema scuro Github

Modalit√† oscura di Twitter o tema scuro di Twitter
L'estensione Twitter Dark Mode converte il tema Twitter in un tema carbone scuro/blu altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Twitter Dark Reader si basa sul tema predefinito di Twitter. Tema scuro di Twitter

Modalit√† oscura di Google Documenti e tema scuro di Google Documenti
Attiva la modalit√† oscura per Google Documenti con un clic tramite questa estensione.

Utilizzare una modalit√† oscura per Google Documenti?
L'estensione Dark Mode di Google Docs converte il tema di Google Docs in un tema antracite scuro/blu altamente personalizzabile. L'estensione Google Docs Dark Reader si basa sul tema predefinito di Google Documenti. Tema scuro di Google Documenti

Scarica ora la modalit√† oscura nel tuo browser web! Funzionalit√† Dark Mode per Google, YouTube, Facebook e molti altri siti Web: scaricala ora e mantieni gli occhi rilassati nelle ore buie!

Modalit√† oscura VK o tema scuro Vk
Tema scuro classico per Vkontakte. Passa VK alla modalit√† oscura e torna indietro con un clic. Tema scuro VKontakte protegge gli occhi. Elimina il carico di notte, sostituendo lo schermo bianco con un classico tema scuro.

Twitch modalit√† oscura o tema scuro Twitch
Twitch dark mode tema scuro nativo altamente personalizzabile per twitch.tv (piattaforma per giocatori). Il tema scuro di Twitch √® un tema scuro nativo per la piattaforma di gioco twitch.tv che utilizza il tema scuro integrato per attivare e disattivare la modalit√† oscura.

Modalit√† oscura per TikTok
Tema scuro per TikTok. Cambia facilmente la modalit√† del sito TikTok in scuro o chiaro con un clic.

Sentiti libero di fare qualsiasi domanda e lasciare commenti per Dark Theme.

üåô Activate Dark Mode for your web browser to protect your eyes while using the computer.

üí° Working on a computer at night may strain your eyes and disturb others in the room. Dark Mode helps reduce screen brightness, promoting eye care.

üåê While Dark Mode may not be suitable for all websites, applying warm colors universally serves as a great alternative for screen tinting.

üöÄ Dark Mode extension effortlessly shifts browser content colors to a warmer tone after dark. Refresh tabs for optimal performance.

‚ö° After installing Dark Mode, refresh tabs opened before installation for full effect. Restart the web to refresh all tabs at once.

üåà Features of the extension:

- Free with no in-app purchases
- Enable dark mode for any website
- Easy one-click installation
- Lightweight, ensuring no impact on computer speed

üíª Screen Shader Mode: A delightful experience for your eyes! Share your feedback and suggestions in the comments section!

long.ml:
Dark Reader for Chrome will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Dark Mode for social networks - dark theme for Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube adn mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

If the website has built-in dark theme, you can control it directly from Night mode and if it doesn't (like Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github and millions others),  dark mode extension will convert the colors to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

What will you get from dark mode extension:

- Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion. Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion. Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer. Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

night shift and dark reader extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Reader
Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making them high contrast and easy to read at night. Dark mode will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme 
Instagram Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Instagram Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Instagram dark theme

Facebook dark mode or Facebook dark theme 
FB Dark Mode extension converts Facebook theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Facebook Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Facebook dark theme

Github dark mode or Github dark theme 
Github Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Github Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Github dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Use a Dark Mode for Google Docs?
Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Download dark mode now in your web browser! Dark Mode functionality for Google, YouTube, Facebook and many other websites - get it now and keep your eyes relaxed in dark hours!

VK dark mode or Vk dark theme 
Classic dark theme for Vkontakte. Switch VK to dark mode and back in one click. Dark theme VKontakte protects the eyes. It eliminates the load at night, replacing the white screen with a classic dark theme.

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Theme.

The Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night. PDF Dark Mode

Dark theme for VK  and Night Mode for Vkontakte

Dark mode and night shift for all popular sites in one place. Dark Youtube, Dark Facebook, Dark Twitter, all these and much more in your browser. Simply install an extension to enable black mode for Chrome. 

Dark Mode and  night shift - apply Dark Youtube & Facebook Skin. Dark YouTube theme protects eyes by changing Youtube & FB colors to black.Dark YouTube - an automatic way to apply Black Youtube Skin. 

New Tab for Chrome with ChatGPT
Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. New Tab - Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tab with ChatGPT. Open AI ChatGPT

ChatGPT for Google
ChatGPT engage in conversations with humans and answer a wide range of questions on various topics. ChatGPT -  start a chat with ChatGPT immediately after getting an answer.

Activating Dark Mode for CharGPT - Open AI
 - ChatGPT offers a dark mode option for a more comfortable viewing experience in low-light settings. 
 - This can also help reduce eye strain.

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Reader. Your feedback is very important for us!

long.ro:
Dark Reader is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen (browser) to dark at night time

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Social networks, mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

Features extension Dark Reader  :

-  Dark Reader - Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Dark Reader -  Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

"Dark Theme for Google" extension brings a customizable dark theme to some of the Google services such as Google Search and Google Images. The extension supports all localized Google domains.

Using this Facebook Dark Mode extension you can customize many colors including background and link colors on the options page of the extension if you don't like the default configuration. 

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Dark Reader  Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion
‚úîÔ∏è Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion.
‚úîÔ∏è Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer.
‚úîÔ∏è Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Enjoy the dark theme New Tab 
Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Mode extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. This Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Download dark mode now in your web browser!

Twitch Dark Mode and Dark Reader 
A highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers)

This package will change appearance of all GitHub pages to dark theme, mostly based on Atom One Dark.

GitHub Dark Theme extension doesn't collect/share/care about your data at all. Access permission only for store your custom domain for GitHub Enterprise feature. Dark Reader 

Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tabs

The Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night. PDF Dark Mode

Dark theme for VK  and Night Mode for Vkontakte

HOW TO USE Dark Reader:
1. Turn on/off the dark mode manually:
+ After installing the Super Dark Mode, you need to reload all opened sites.
+ Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode or use shortcut: Ctrl+Q (Windows, Linux, Chromebook), CMD+Q (Mac).

2. Automatic schedule:
+ Right click on the extension icon.
+ Choose "Options".

3. Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode:
+ Right click on the site.
+ Choose Dark Mode > "Disable/Enable Super Dark Mode for this site" 

4. Customize colors for websites:
- On the option page, navigate to "General Dark Themes", choose "Modern Dark Theme".

Dark mode and night shift for all popular sites in one place. Dark Youtube, Dark Facebook, Dark Twitter, all these and much more in your browser. Simply install an extension to enable black mode for Chrome. 

Dark Mode and  night shift - apply Dark Youtube & Facebook Skin. Dark YouTube theme protects eyes by changing Youtube & FB colors to black.Dark YouTube - an automatic way to apply Black Youtube Skin. 

Note!
By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing ' - Dark Theme for Chrome extension that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Reader. Your feedback is very important for us!

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme 
Instagram Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Instagram Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Instagram dark theme

FB Dark Mode extension converts Facebook theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Facebook Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Facebook dark theme

Github dark mode or Github dark theme 
Github Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Github Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Github dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Use a Dark Mode for Google Docs?
Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Download dark mode now in your web browser! Dark Mode functionality for Google, YouTube, Facebook and many other websites - get it now and keep your eyes relaxed in dark hours!

VK dark mode or Vk dark theme 
Classic dark theme for Vkontakte. Switch VK to dark mode and back in one click. Dark theme VKontakte protects the eyes. It eliminates the load at night, replacing the white screen with a classic dark theme.

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

temni naƒçin - temni bralnik za Chrome bo postavil temno temo na vsa spletna mesta, primerno za tiste, ki delajo ponoƒçi, in temni bralnik za spletne novice ali branje knjig.

Uporabite vsa spletna mesta v brskalniku v temnem naƒçinu in izkljuƒçite katero koli domeno iz ƒçrne teme za bolj≈°o izku≈°njo. Mo≈æno je ustvariti svojo temo po meri s katero koli barvo, ki vam je v≈°eƒç.

Temni naƒçin za dru≈æabna omre≈æja - temna tema za Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube in mainstream spletna mesta ter vsa druga spletna mesta bodo vsa skupaj prekrita s ƒçrno barvo.

ƒåe ima spletno mesto vgrajeno temno temo, jo lahko upravljate neposredno iz noƒçnega naƒçina, ƒçe pa je nima (kot so Gmail, Google Dokumenti, Office Online, Github in milijoni drugih), bo raz≈°iritev temnega naƒçina pretvorila barve, da vam zagotovi z gladkim in doslednim temnim naƒçinom.

Kaj boste dobili od raz≈°iritve temnega naƒçina:

- Roƒçno vklopite/izklopite temni naƒçin - Kliknite ikono raz≈°iritve, da vklopite/izklopite temni naƒçin.
- Izkljuƒçi/vkljuƒçi spletno mesto iz temnega naƒçina - Izberite "Temni naƒçin" > "Onemogoƒçi/omogoƒçi temni naƒçin za to spletno mesto"
- Prilagodite barve za spletna mesta - Spremenite vse ≈æelene barve.
- Samodejni urnik - V razdelku omogoƒçite "Auto ON/OFF".

Niƒç veƒç vam ni treba odpirati nastavitev eno za drugo za razliƒçna spletna mesta ‚Äì samo ena aplikacija prina≈°a ƒçrno temo po celotnem omre≈æju.

Stran z mo≈ænostmi je zdaj na voljo! Uporabne lastnosti:

- Izkljuƒçitev spletnega mesta. Vnesite pravilen spletni naslov, da stran izkljuƒçite iz uporabe ƒçrne teme.
- Izkljuƒçitev strani. Po ≈æelji dodajte domene, ki jih ne ≈æelite uporabiti v ƒçrni temi.
- Sprememba teme. Ustvarite svojo temo po meri! Shranite, preimenujte in uporabite kadar koli.

Preprosto namestite raz≈°iritev, da omogoƒçite temni naƒçin za Chrome.

Noƒçna izmena
Aktivirajte naƒçin Night Shift, da obrnete obiƒçajno svetlobo z zaslona na toplej≈°i ton in tako prepreƒçite po≈°kodbe oƒçi. Orodje lahko vklopite in izklopite z enim klikom, ko ga potrebujete.

noƒçna izmena in raz≈°iritev temnega bralnika samodejno premakneta barve vsebine va≈°ega brskalnika na toplej≈°i konec barvnega spektra, ko se zmraƒçi.

Temni bralec
Dark Reader obrne svetle barve, zaradi ƒçesar so visokokontrastne in enostavne za branje ponoƒçi. Temni naƒçin bo postavil temno temo na vsa spletna mesta, primerno za tiste, ki delajo ponoƒçi, temni bralnik pa za spletne novice ali branje knjig.

Raz≈°iritev Super Dark Mode lahko zatemni skoraj vsa spletna mesta, pa tudi lokalne datoteke, ki jih odpre Chrome, kot so PDF-ji. Odslej so lahko va≈°e oƒçi spro≈°ƒçene, ko ponoƒçi brskate po spletu na zaslonu.

Temni naƒçin Youtube ali temna tema Youtube
Raz≈°iritev Dark Theme for YouTube pretvori temo YouTube v zelo prilagodljivo temno oglje/modro temo. Raz≈°iritev Youtube Dark Reader je zgrajena na privzeti YouTubovi temi (izvorna temna tema), zato je zelo lahka v primerjavi z uporabo tem, ki jih vnesejo raz≈°iritve Stylish ali Stylus.

Temni naƒçin Instagrama ali temna tema Instagrama
Raz≈°iritev Instagram Dark Mode pretvori temo Instagrama v zelo prilagodljivo temno oglje/modro temo. Raz≈°iritev Instagram Dark Reader je zgrajena na privzeti temi Instagram. Temna tema Instagrama

Raz≈°iritev FB Dark Mode pretvori temo Facebooka v zelo prilagodljivo temno oglje/modro temo. Raz≈°iritev Facebook Dark Reader je zgrajena na privzeti temi Instagram. Temna tema Facebooka

Temni naƒçin Google Dokumentov in temna tema Google Dokumentov
Vklopite temni naƒçin za Google Dokumente z enim klikom prek te raz≈°iritve.

Uporabite temni naƒçin za Google Dokumente?
Raz≈°iritev temnega naƒçina za Google Dokumente pretvori temo Google Dokumentov v zelo prilagodljivo temno oglje/modro temo. Raz≈°iritev Google Docs Dark Reader je zgrajena na privzeti temi Google Docs. Temna tema Google Dokumentov

Temni naƒçin VK ali temna tema VK
Klasiƒçna temna tema za Vkontakte. Preklopite VK v temni naƒçin in nazaj z enim klikom. Temna tema VKontakte ≈°ƒçiti oƒçi. Odpravlja obremenitev ponoƒçi in nadomesti beli zaslon s klasiƒçno temno temo.

Temni naƒçin Twitch ali temna tema Twitch
Temni naƒçin Twitch, visoko prilagodljiva izvorna temna tema za twitch.tv (platforma za igralce). Temna tema Twitch je izvorna temna tema za igralno platformo twitch.tv, ki uporablja vgrajeno temno temo za vklop in izklop temnega naƒçina.

Temni naƒçin za TikTok
Temna tema za TikTok. Preprosto preklopite naƒçin spletnega mesta TikTok na temnega ali svetlega z enim klikom.

Postavite kakr≈°na koli vpra≈°anja in pustite komentarje za Temno temo.

Twitch Dark Theme is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen (browser) to dark at night time

Features extension Dark Reader :

-  Dark Reader - Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Dark Reader -  Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

"Dark Theme for Google" extension brings a customizable dark theme to some of the Google services such as Google Search and Google Images. The extension supports all localized Google domains.

Using this Facebook Dark Mode extension you can customize many colors including background and link colors on the options page of the extension if you don't like the default configuration. 

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion
‚úîÔ∏è Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion.
‚úîÔ∏è Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer.
‚úîÔ∏è Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Enjoy the dark theme New Tab 
Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Mode extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. This Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Download dark mode now in your web browser!

Twitch Dark Mode
A highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers)

This package will change appearance of all GitHub pages to dark theme, mostly based on Atom One Dark.

GitHub Dark Theme extension doesn't collect/share/care about your data at all. Access permission only for store your custom domain for GitHub Enterprise feature.

Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tabs

The Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night. PDF Dark Mode

Dark theme for VK  and Night Mode for Vkontakte

HOW TO USE Dark Reader

Dark mode and night shift for all popular sites in one place. Dark Youtube, Dark Facebook, Dark Twitter, all these and much more in your browser. Simply install an extension to enable black mode for Chrome. 

Dark Mode and  night shift - apply Dark Youtube & Facebook Skin. Dark YouTube theme protects eyes by changing Youtube & FB colors to black.Dark YouTube - an automatic way to apply Black Youtube Skin. 

Feel free to ask any questions and leave comments for Dark Reader. Your feedback is very important for us!

Dark Theme for Chrome will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Apply all websites in browser into dark mode and exclude any domain from black theme for better experience. It's possible to create your own custom theme with any color you like. 

Dark Mode for social networks - dark theme for Instagram, twitter, twitch, youtube adn mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

If the website has built-in dark theme, you can control it directly from Night mode and if it doesn't (like Gmail, Google Docs, Office Online, Github and millions others),  dark mode extension will convert the colors to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

What will you get from Dark Mode extension:

- Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Option page is now available! Useful features:

- Site exclusion. Enter a correct web address to exclude the page from black theme applying.
- Page exclusion. Optionally add domains that you don't want to apply into black theme.
- Theme changer. Create your own custom theme! Save it, rename and apply at any time.

Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Reader extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Reader
Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making them high contrast and easy to read at night. Dark mode will put dark theme on all websites, suitable for those work at night and dark reader for online news or book reading.

Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night.

Youtube dark mode or Youtube dark theme 
Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Youtube Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Instagram dark mode or Instagram dark theme 
Instagram Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Instagram Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Instagram dark theme

Facebook dark mode or Facebook dark theme 
FB Dark Mode extension converts Facebook theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Facebook Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Facebook dark theme

Github dark mode or Github dark theme 
Github Dark Mode extension converts Instagram theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Github Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Instagram theme. Github dark theme

Twitter dark mode or Twitter dark theme 
Twitter Dark Mode extension converts Twitter theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Twitter Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Twitter theme. Twitter dark theme

Google Docs Dark Mode and Google Docs dark theme
Turn on Dark Mode for Google Docs in one click via this extension.

Google Docs Dark Mode extension converts Google Docs theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. Google Docs Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default Google Docs theme. Google Docs dark theme

Twitch dark mode or Twitch dark theme 
Twitch dark mode  highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers). Twitch dark theme  is a native dark theme for twitch.tv gaming platform which uses the built-in dark theme for toggling the dark mode on and off. 

Dark Mode for TikTok
Dark theme for TikTok. Easily switch TikTok site mode to dark or light with one click.

New Tab for Chrome with ChatGPT
Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. New Tab - Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tab with ChatGPT. Open AI ChatGPT

ChatGPT for Google
ChatGPT engage in conversations with humans and answer a wide range of questions on various topics. ChatGPT -  start a chat with ChatGPT immediately after getting an answer.

Activating Dark Mode for CharGPT - Open AI
 - ChatGPT offers a dark mode option for a more comfortable viewing experience in low-light settings. 
 - This can also help reduce eye strain.

Dark Mode is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen (browser) to dark at night time.

Social networks, mainstream sites and all other websites will be all together covered into black colors. 

Features extension Dark Reader :
-  Dark Reader - Turn on/off the dark mode manually - Click on the extension icon to turn on/off the dark mode.
- Exclude/Include a site from the dark mode - Choose "Dark Mode" > "Disable/Enable Dark Mode for this site"
- Dark Reader -  Customize colors for websites - Change all colors you want.
- Automatic schedule - Enable "Auto ON/OFF" in the section.

"Dark Theme for Google" extension brings a customizable dark theme to some of the Google services such as Google Search and Google Images. The extension supports all localized Google domains.

Using this Facebook Dark Mode extension you can customize many colors including background and link colors on the options page of the extension if you don't like the default configuration. 

No more needs to open settings one by one for different websites - just one app brings black theme across the whole net. 

Enjoy the dark theme New Tab 
Simply install an extension to enable Dark Mode for Chrome.

Night Shift
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the usual light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.

Night Shift and Dark Mode extension automatically shifts the colors of your browser content to warmer end of the color spectrum after dark. 

Dark Theme for YouTube extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. This Dark Reader extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Download dark mode now in your web browser!

Twitch Dark Mode
A highly customizable native dark theme for twitch.tv (platform for gamers)

This package will change appearance of all GitHub pages to dark theme, mostly based on Atom One Dark.

GitHub Dark Theme extension doesn't collect/share/care about your data at all. Access permission only for store your custom domain for GitHub Enterprise feature.

Dark internet changes all web pages to black colour. Dark mode for Twitter, Youtube, Facebook and all New Tabs

The Super Dark Mode extension can darken almost all websites, as well as local files opened by Chrome, such as PDFs. From now on, your eyes can be relaxed when browsing the web on the screen at night. PDF Dark Mode

Dark theme for VK  and Night Mode for Vkontakte

Dark mode and night shift for all popular sites in one place. Dark Youtube, Dark Facebook, Dark Twitter, all these and much more in your browser. Simply install an extension to enable black mode for Chrome. 

Dark Mode and  night shift - apply Dark Youtube & Facebook Skin. Dark YouTube theme protects eyes by changing Youtube & FB colors to black.Dark YouTube - an automatic way to apply Black Youtube Skin.
